title: A family is hearing howling behind their home identical to the howls on the BFRO website
observed: I listened to the alleged Bigfoot howling on the BFRO website and have came to a conclusion that I'm hearing almost exactly the same type of howling in the woods behind my northern Portage County Ohio home. The last time I heard this sound was two weeks ago and when I was out working in the backyard. We often hear it at dusk.
location_details: Off of State Route 44 in northern Portage County.
